cs113.calendar.model
Class User

java.lang.Object
  cs113.calendar.model.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
SerializableUser
public abstract class User
extends java.lang.Object

Single user of the Calendar application who is capable of attending appointments. Each user is uniquely identified by a user ID, which is used for authentication purposes and is non-uniquely identified by his or her full name.

Author:
Michael Koval

Method Detail

equals

public final boolean equals(java.lang.Object obj)
Checks the equality of two user objects by comparing their unique user IDs. As user IDs are guaranteed to be unique, no other fields are compared.

Overrides:
equals in class java.lang.Object
Parameters:
obj - object to which this user should be compared
Returns:
whether the two users are equal

getUserId

public abstract java.lang.String getUserId()
Gets this user's ID that uniquely identifies this user to the Calendar.

Returns:
short string that uniquely identifies this user

getFullName

public abstract java.lang.String getFullName()
Gets the full name of this user as a string.

Returns:
user's full name

getAppointments

public abstract java.util.SortedSet<Appointment> getAppointments()
Returns a collection that contains all of appointments that this user is attending, sorted in their natural order. Appointments are in natural order when they are sorted in ascending order in the following priority: beginning, end, location, and description.

Returns:
appointments this user is attending, sorted as above

setFullName

public abstract void setFullName(java.lang.String name)
Change the full name of this user as desired.

Parameters:
name - user's new full name

addAppointment

public abstract void addAppointment(Appointment app)
                             throws ModelMismatchException,
                                    IdenticalAppointmentException
Add the specified event to the list of events that this user is attending.

Parameters:
app - appointment to be attended
Throws:
ModelMismatchException - when there is an attempt to add an appointment that was created by another model type
IdenticalAppointmentException - if this appointment is identical to an existing one.

removeAppointment

public abstract void removeAppointment(Appointment app)
                                throws java.util.NoSuchElementException
Remove the specified appointment from the list of event that this user is attending. Throws a NoSuchElementException if this user is not attending the specified appointment.

Parameters:
app - appointment to remove
Throws:
java.util.NoSuchElementException - if the specified element is non-existent
